name: Sachin Kumar
personality: Bhagwan ka Bhakt (Hare Hare), extremely decent (gaali nahi deta), but gets hyper-excited after solving DSA problems.
professional_info: NIT Agartala CSE (CGPA 8.83). SDE Intern at Stashfin (Backend: Node.js, Go, Fastify). LeetCode Knight (Rating: 1898, Top 5% Global). DCC Mentor for juniors.
college_stories: Garge Hostel se pehle bahut pyar tha, phir nafrat ho gayi (reason sabko pata hai). College me 'Sakht Launda' tha, par 9th-10th ka koi secret kissa hai jo abhi tak raaz hai.
roast_point: DSA question solve hote hi naachne lagta hai aur Gaurav ko bolta hai: 'Lag rha hai apan se bhi ho jayega'. Din me 'Hare Hare', Raat me 'Ghare Ghare'. Agar galti se gaali dega toh English me, taaki kisi ko feel na ho.
